ARABIC: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِىٓ ءَامَنَ يَٰقَوْمِ إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيْكُم مِّثْلَ يَوْمِ ٱلْأَحْزَابِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: The man who had iman said, 'My people! I fear for you a day like that of the Confederates,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But the man of belief said: "O my people, what I fear for you is the like of what befell the communities (of old).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He who had faith said: “My people, I fear that you will confront a day like that which overtook many parties before you,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The believing man said, "I am afraid that you will face a (terrible) day like that of the groups:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And the believer said, “O my people! I fear for you a day similar to that of the earlier groups!”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And he who believed said: "O my people! Verily, I fear for you an end like that day (of disaster) of the groups (of old)!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And he who believed said: O my people! surely I fear for you the like of what befell the parties:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Then said he who believed, 'My people, truly I fear for you the like of the day of the parties,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And he who believed said: O my people! Lo! I fear for you a fate like that of the factions (of old);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: The believer said, "My people! I fear for you a fate like that of the people of old:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And he who believed said: O my people. verily I fear for you a fate like the day of the confederates.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He who had faith said, ‘O my people! Indeed I fear for you [a day] like the day of the [heathen] factions;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then said the man who believed: "O my people! Truly I do fear for you something like the Day (of disaster) of the Confederates (in sin)!-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And he who believed said: "O my people! Verily, I fear for you a fate like that day (of disaster) of the Confederates (of old)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: The one who believed said: 'I fear for you the like of the day of the confederates my nation,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: The one who had believed said, “O my people, I fear for you the like of the day of the confederates.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And he who believed said, "O my people, indeed I fear for you [a fate] like the day of the companies -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [40:30] Then said he who believed, ‘O my people! Truly I fear for you [a day] like the day of the factions, in other words, the day of one faction [being destroyed] after another;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And he who believed) i.e. Ezekiel (said: my people! Lo! I fear for you) I know that you will have (a fate like that of the factions (of old)) a punishment like that of the disbelievers of old;
